channel.title: Just Need to Know Two Things
channel.description:
Either a link or short TuT on how to make an aggressive NPC and change the max stat from 99 - ?
or a few keywords to search for Thank you for your time

item.title: Just Need to Know Two Things
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:3, topic:261066”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=344734.msg2659476#msg2659476 date=1234097920]
To make NPCs aggressive, it’s in your NPCHandler class. If you want to change the max stat, that’s in your player class.
[/quote]

The maximum stat may also be in your client class ;)[/quote]

True, but there’s no need for two examples.

Read full topic
item.source: Just Need to Know Two Things
